sub_title: Lead Service Delivery Coordinator at Baker Hughes
summary:
Completions Engineer with 6+ years of experience in oil and gas industry, consolidated knowledge from quotation to invoicing included technical support and installation process of Completions Systems. Self motivated, performance driven, team oriented professional with international experience in 4 countries for different operators with different roles within Baker Hughes. Successfully graduated from Baker Hughes 3 year LEAD program with technical, administrative and management skills.  

My key experience is:
Full Supervision on below Completion systems:
*  Single-zone, Multi-zone and Multilateral Level 5 Completions with:
-  Packers Systems: Permanents & Retrievable, Hydraulic, Mechanical and Hydrostatic set
-  Surface Controlled Sub-Surface Safety Systems 
-  Intelligent Production Systems with Permanent Downhole Monitoring Systems
-  Intelligent Well Systems with Hydraulic sliding sleeves and Chemical Injection Valves
-  Liner Hanger Systems

courses.name: Norwegian Oil and Gas accepted upgrade to the Norwegian Continental Shelf
Offshre Safety Introduction & Emergency Response Training ( NOGEPO 0.5B) Included HUET Plus Emergency Breathing System

profile_positions.description:
- Champion service delivery coordinator for Central Europe and responsible coaching the rest coordinators to new launched digital portal and update all new features
- Responsible from Quotation to invoicing for main customers in Continental Europe
- Focused in improving service delivery and customer satisfaction
- Responsible for system design, technical support in Cased Hole, Intelligent Completions, Wellbore Construction, testing, implementing lessons learned and follow up in downhole tools and service equipment
- Introducing new technologies to customer for future projects
- Liaising with local and overseas engineers to build or complete the existing design package
- Conducting root cause analysis on all assigned non conformance issues
- Managing customer and company owned inventory utilization
- Ensuring that company activities were conducted in accordance with contract requirements
- Meeting with clients and preparing tender as required
- Assisting customer to design and build Oil/Gas/Geothermal wells

profile_positions.description:
Operations Coordinator for Lukoil Level 5 Multilateral Project
- Responsible for System Design, Technical Support in Cased Hole, Smart and Multilateral Completions, Testing, Implementing Lessons learns and follow up in downhole tools and service equipment
- Supervising all activities and ensure Company HSE policies and Customer QCP is followed accordingly
- Introducing New Technologies to Customer for further projects

- Providing 24 hour technical and administrative support
- Managing customer and company-owned inventory utilization
